cookedApple.name: Cooked Apple
cookedApple.description: A warm, baked apple. Soft, sweet, and comforting.

cookedFish.name: Grilled Fish
cookedFish.description: A plain, grilled fish. Tastes a bit metallic, but fills the belly.

cornChowder.name: Corn Chowder
cornChowder.description: A thick, hearty soup made from corn and milk (or something like it).

vegetableMedley.name: Vegetable Medley
vegetableMedley.description: A mix of roasted vegetables. Very healthy.

fruitSalad.name: Fruit Salad
fruitSalad.description: A bowl of chopped fruits. Fresh and energizing.

lemonade.name: Lemonade
lemonade.description: Freshly squeezed lemons, water, and a bit of hope. Refreshing.
